eventName: Such is the Joy of Our Reunion
storyInfo: The Young Chef gives Blaze's longevity noodles his seal of approval. Leizi finds another way to access the Academy's archives, allowing her to take her investigation in a new direction.

attributes.content: Early the next morning, the restaurant is still quiet, save for a few fowlbeasts jumping back and forth on the fallen leaves outside the door.
The night watchman at the Judicial Review Office lets out a loud yawn. The fowlbeasts take off in all directions.
*Yawns* Ughh...
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: I had a nightmare last night that a beckbeast ate all the flour in my kitchen. How terrifying!
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Morning!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Have some noodles!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You... figured out how to make them?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Look at the bags under your eyes. Were you practicing all night?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Haha. No. Only about half the night. Hey, Xingzhu still hasn't woken up yet.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Enough talking for now. Try the noodles!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You.... huh?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: You gave up learning how to knead the dough and boiled some ready-made noodles instead?!
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: These are no ordinary ready-made noodles. Xingzhu and I looked through all the ready-made noodles on the market, and picked the ones we feel have a texture closest to your hand-made ones.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Of course, they don't have quite the same mouthfeel as hand-made noodles. So Xingzhu adjusted your soup base recipe to ensure they taste similar to the longevity noodles you make from scratch.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: This is blasphemy! You're using ready-made noodles, and you tampered with my recipe? My word!
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Don't jump to any conclusions yet. Please, have a taste!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The Young Chef picks up his chopsticks, and, with a giant frown on his face, pulls out some of the noodles. He carefully takes a sniff, then finally takes a taste.
Hmm...
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Well...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hmm...
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Say something!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Why did you two think this would work?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Xingzhu was starving after all my failed attempts! I figured at that point, I was better off just making noodles I knew how to make, so at least she'd have something to eat!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Then I started thinking: the most important element of longevity noodles isn't the taste. Instead, it's making sure the person who eats them feels the birthday blessing.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Some people just aren't skilled enough to make noodles like you do. However, I can still use ready-made noodles to bring birthday blessings to myself or my family. That's the real meaning of longevity noodles, anyway.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: See how yellow and shiny these noodles are? They look more lively than yours, right?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Of course, yes, I am taking shortcuts with this dish...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You mentioned birthday blessings. Do you think people can taste that in your noodles?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: I... think so?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Last night, after I finally made a proper bowl of noodles for the first time, I shared them with Xingzhu. We felt so happy when eating it. I even caught Xingzhu wiping away tears...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Swapping out the noodles, then adjusting the oil and salt ratios accordingly... Quite some innovation there. Xingzhu sure has a sharp palate.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: But the ready-made noodles need to be rinsed with cold water after cooking. You rinsed them, but you didn't drain all the cold water out.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: The cold water lowered the temperature of the soup, which also affected the texture of the noodles. If you really want to make good food, you need to be mindful of these little details.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Got it! I'll remember that!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Wait, then you mean...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Enough. I'm only continuing to teach you because I can see you've put in the effort.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: You still need to learn how to make your own noodles from scratch. You don't really expect to use ready-made noodles in the competition, do you?
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Hehe. Great!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: As your shifu, I'm glad that you've improved. But we still have to see whether the customers recognize your efforts.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Well... what do we do?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Later on, if anyone orders noodles, you'll make them.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: If the customer doesn't like the noodles, then you'll need to keep practicing.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: I'm on it!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hello! Would you like to try our special longevity noodles?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: It's not my birthday. Why would I want longevity noodles?
attributes.name: Sharp Dressed Man

attributes.content: It's a new dish we're trying out. We'll give it to you for free!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: No. I meant, if you try it, and like it, then maybe you should still pay for it. I mean, I have to settle up with the boss, you know.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: That's... an interesting way to do business.
attributes.name: Sharp Dressed Man

attributes.content: Sure. Give me that bowl of noodles, then.
attributes.name: Sharp Dressed Man

attributes.content: (eager eyes)
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Uhh... do you need something else from me?
attributes.name: Sharp Dressed Man

attributes.content: No! No! I just want to see how you like the noodles.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Okay okay. I'll give them a try.
attributes.name: Sharp Dressed Man

attributes.content: The man picks up one single noodle using his chopsticks, then a piece of bok choy, and some scallions. He tries them one after another.
He eats with graceful manners, but somehow, in just a few moments' time, the entire bowl is empty.
What do you think?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Mmmm... Good. Even excellent.
attributes.name: Sharp Dressed Man

attributes.content: R-Really?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The soup has a rich umami taste, and the ingredients are top notch. If you had let the soup simmer for another day or so, it might have tasted even better.
attributes.name: Sharp Dressed Man

attributes.content: But I was already so hungry. If I had tried to wait another day for that ultimate perfection, I would have starved...
attributes.name: Sharp Dressed Man

attributes.content: He wants to create the perfect taste, but the customer cannot wait that long.
attributes.name: Sharp Dressed Man

attributes.content: Even if I want to wait for him... there are some things that I just can't wait for any longer...
attributes.name: Sharp Dressed Man

attributes.content: You're saying...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Don't worry about it. Just tell your boss what I said, yeah?
attributes.name: Sharp Dressed Man

attributes.content: The man stands up. The patterns on his clothes emit a strange glow; the light distorts and blurs his face, so much so that Blaze cannot make out what he looks like.
Hey! You... you didn't pay!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Just deduct the funds from my account.
attributes.name: Sharp Dressed Man

attributes.content: Regardless of what you're looking for, after you leave here, do not tell anyone you got this file from the Academy. Do you understand?
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: Yes...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: What's wrong? Do you have more questions?
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: Do you remember... that bloody case... back in 1062?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: This isn't the sort of thing you casually bring up in a conversation.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: I just happened to think of it.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Is the Grand Preceptor you previously mentioned, the one who supported the academic reforms which benefited countless poor students, the same Grand Preceptor who murdered the emperor and plotted treason forty years ago?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: I have no way to answer your question. I will never speak about things that I do not know.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: I have never met that Grand Preceptor in person, but I have read some of her writings on political and social issues. Her extensive knowledge, clearly reflected in her works, has been deeply enriching for me.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: But people are complicated and cannot be easily categorized.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: You're saying you're not completely convinced that the outcome of that case was correct?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Qingyan, you are never good at hiding what you are thinking.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: I knew you would...
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: The Office's archives will not house muddled cases, no matter how many people they involve.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Solving those cases is my duty as deputy minister.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: I shall not dissuade you from doing as you see fit. However, you must learn to protect yourself, no matter what happens.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: *sigh* Before your parents retreated into seclusion in the mountains, they entrusted me with looking after you. If anything were to happen to you, I would never be able to look them in the eyes again.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: I'm not a child. Why do I need people to take care of me?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Everyone feels that way when they are young. However, as a mother, watching Zuo Le grow up, day by day, I feel a weight growing on my heart.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: What else should we parents worry about, other than our children's safety?
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: But if your parents learned that I prevented you from fulfilling your duties out of concern for your 'safety', then they really would blame me.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: Duoxie... Sister...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: *sigh* You call me your sister, but in my eyes, you have always been like a child of my son's generation.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: Speaking of which, Yumen is near Baizao now. Have you seen General Zuo at all over the past few days?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Things are coming to a head. The Ministry of War is holding meetings day and night, and the general must remain on the front lines to oversee things personally.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: Neither he nor I can abandon our posts.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: There is truly no way to avoid this conflict?
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: This isn't something I have the authority to decide.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: As an Advisor for the Ministry of War, my job is to do everything in my power to accurately calculate the outcome of the war. Allowing any personal biases to affect my work would be a grave disservice to the people of Yan.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: You don't compromise in your duties, and neither do I.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: I hope everything goes smoothly...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: If the outcome is inevitable, it's best not to worry too much about it.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: If you are alone for the Mid-Autumn Festival, come to my home for dinner.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: ...I will.
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: Wait... I just thought of something.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: Didn't you just ask me who has authority to alter the Academy's records?
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: That did happen once, although it was under extremely unusual circumstances.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: You mean...
attributes.name: Lin Qingyan

attributes.content: No. I can't say that the records were ever altered. However, if a record has gone missing entirely, then it must have been transferred to another location—
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: Death row, at the Ministry of Justice.
attributes.name: Professor Jing

attributes.content: Father is not here?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It's been more than six months since he was last here. The furnishings in the house have not changed, only there are many more symbols symbolizing war on the sand table.
A lone city stands in defiance, the two sides gazing at each other from afar.
Lord Zuo...
A thick, familiar voice rings out from behind.
Uncle Taihe!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Your... your injuries?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I was finally able to walk since two weeks ago, albeit with some difficulty. At least I'm no longer bedridden.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Zuo Le stares at Taihe unbelievably, who does not look like the man he remembers.
The wind lifts a corner of his cloak, revealing his thin, withered figure under his wide robe.
Taihe, once a man so strong and sturdy, is now emaciated. It's as if a mere gust of wind could blow him away.
Uncle Taihe...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Kung fu is merely an external tool. I am, after all, still a monitor censor of the Department of Discipline and Supervision, and there will always be opportunities to realize my aspirations.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: If you continue to dwell on this, Lord Zuo, then you're only underestimating my skills.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: No...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Taihe, I know you are no ordinary man. A few injuries aren't enough to stop you!
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: It has been over six months since we last met. You look stronger than before. The General will be pleased.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: By the way, Father is...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The General has been in constant meetings with the Sui Regulator and the Ministry of War. He's barely had ten minutes to rest.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: The situation...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: ...Could change in an instant.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Is the court still ready to go to war at all costs?
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Now, after the incident in Dahuang, the bestial Sui is no longer under the Sui Regulator's control.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: There are some minor disagreements between the cabinet and the Six Ministries, but their overall opinion is clear—
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: Eliminate the threat once and for all.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: But... the consequences of this war will be...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: I heard that one month ago, other Candleholders discovered traces of the convict near Baizao.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Yes. I heard the same thing.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: The imperial court is on high alert; they've already dispatched several units of Imperial Guards.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: The Imperial Guards...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: The convict's unpredictability is currently the gravest threat we face.
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I have a theory, perhaps...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: There is still another Proxy in Baizao...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: This Proxy is the 'youngest', and the most unique.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: According to the Sui Regulator's observations, in the hundreds of years since he left the tomb, he has never used any of his powers. The Sui Regulator does not know how to deal with him...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: There's only one thing that's a little suspicious—one hundred years ago, after Wang escaped from prison, he came to Baizao and has remained here ever since.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Wang used to frequently interact with other Proxies, so I am afraid that during his current return to Baizao, the lone Proxy who stayed here would also be part of his plan.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: What do you plan to do?
attributes.name: Taihe

attributes.content: I don't know yet, so I'm going to go take a look...
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: ...And see for myself.
attributes.name: Zuo Le

attributes.content: Phew! Finished!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: What do you think? I've memorized every step, from washing the vegetables to serving the noodles. I can do this all by myself now!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Of course, it's all thanks to Xingzhu for figuring out a genius solution—I just need to dip my hands in ice water for five minutes before kneading the dough, and it comes out fine.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: It looks good, and I can taste the craftsmanship in the dish.
attributes.name: Xingzhu

attributes.content: It'll do, even if it's far from perfect.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: If anyone could cook as well as me after just a few classes, then all my years of study would be in vain.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Hey, I've been working hard for so long, and tomorrow is the big day. Can't you at least say something encouraging?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I just don't want you to get a big head... Alright, maybe you're right—a little pep talk might do you good; otherwise, you'd be too scared to cook the minute you meet Mo Bufu.
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Remember: there's nothing to be afraid of. Mo Bufu is old. Show him the power of your youth!
attributes.name: Young Chef

attributes.content: Okay!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Everything's ready. Let's go win one at Ding Feng Lou tomorrow!
attributes.name: Blaze
